project.description: Testing polling of git for build triggering

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: GITFLOW_BRANCH
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The standard gitflow branch in the github repository to be pulled for the maven build. (Unless overridden by the BRANCH parameter).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the github repository to be pulled for the maven build. (Change the default value to build against a custom branch).

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_REPO_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The git repository from which the build will pull source code.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_REFSPEC
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Controls the remote refs to be retrieved and how they map to local refs. The default ref narrows refs to retrieve to a specific branch. To narrow down to a specific tag or tags (will use the latest matching pattern used) use:
+refs/tags/[tag pattern]:refs/remotes/origin/tags/[tag pattern]
To narrow to the HEAD of a branch use:
+refs/heads/${BRANCH}:refs/remotes/origin/${BRANCH}

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_BRANCHES_TO_BUILD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the branches if you'd like to track a specific branch in a repository. If left blank, all branches will be examined for changes and built.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set +x
echo "GIT_COMMIT - SHA of the current:" echo $GIT_COMMIT echo ""
echo "GIT_BRANCH - Name of the remote repository (defaults to origin), followed by name of the branch currently being used, e.g. \"origin/master" or "origin/foo\":" echo $GIT_BRANCH echo ""
echo "GIT_LOCAL_BRANCH - Name of the branch on Jenkins. When the \"checkout to specific local branch\" behavior is configured, the variable is published. If the behavior is configured as null or **, the property will contain the resulting local branch name sans the remote name. :" echo $GIT_LOCAL_BRANCH echo ""
echo "GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT - SHA of the previous built commit from the same branch (the current SHA on first build in branch):" echo $GIT_PREVIOUS_COMMIT echo ""
echo "GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT - SHA of the previous successfully built commit from the same branch.:" echo $GIT_PREVIOUS_SUCCESSFUL_COMMIT echo ""
echo "GIT_URL - Repository remote URL:" echo $GIT_URL echo ""
echo "GIT_URL_N - Repository remote URLs when there are more than 1 remotes, e.g. GIT_URL_1, GIT_URL_2:" echo $GIT_URL_N echo ""
echo "GIT_AUTHOR_NAME and GIT_COMMITTER_NAME - The name entered if the \"Custom user name/e-mail address\" behaviour is enabled; falls back to the value entered in the Jenkins system config under \"Global Config user.name Value\" (if any):" echo "$GIT_AUTHOR_NAME and $GIT_COMMITTER_NAME" echo ""
echo "GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL and GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL - The email entered if the \"Custom user name/e-mail address\" behaviour is enabled; falls back to the value entered in the Jenkins system config under \"Global Config user.email Value\" (if any):" echo "$GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL and $GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL" echo ""
set -x
